text: Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Starfield. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL65 9SDK-034 15.6" Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the fan noise is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

An average performer. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 is good, but I expected a bit more from the keyboard on the MSI GL Series GL65 9SDK-034 15.6" Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop. It's a fair choice if you can get it on a good deal.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Cyberpunk 2077 and Apex Legends. The build quality of the MSI GL Series GL65 9SDK-034 15.6" Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the speakers is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

The MSI GL Series GL65 9SDK-034 15.6" Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop does what it says on the tin. Good for streaming games, but the port selection could be better. Had a minor issue with bloatware, but it was resolved. Solid, but not spectacular.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for AAA gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1660 in the MSI GL Series GL65 9SDK-034 15.6" Intel Core i7 9th Gen 9750H (2.60 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 8 GB Memory 512 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Home 64-bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.
